channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Joyful Mysteries of the Annunciation, Visitation, Nativity, Presentation and Finding and its graces and virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Le Chapelet De La Divine Misericorde
channel.desc: The Chaplet of the Divine Mercy is prayed in French by the parish of Our Lady of the Nativity in La Garde, France. Our Lord taught Sister Faustina in Poland, the five decades to recite. Spoken and sung with portrayals of Jesus' Passion and Resurrection. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Fr. Leo Clifford treats the understanding of how faith impacts life and how it is different from experience. Walking with Our Lord by using the Scriptures enhances our faith in God. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Sainte Brigitte De Su?de ? 2eme Partie: Vers Rome
channel.desc: Ce docudrame original d'EWTN pr?sente la vie et les r?v?lations mystiques de sainte Brigitte de Su?de, la grande sainte du XIVe si?cle. Ce deuxi?me ?pisode pr?sente ses r?v?lations mystiques alors qu?elle ?tablissait un nouvel ordre religieux, men? une vie de pri?re constante et plaidait pour une r?forme eccl?siale. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics Come Home
channel.desc: As a former lapsed Catholic, Maria Hirsch shares her rediscovery of her Catholic Faith that lead her back to her Catholic roots began while serving as Director of a ballet school. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica uses her wit and wisdom as she examines the story of St. Paul and the folded tent. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: St. Paul The Apostle Burning For Christ
channel.desc: An EWTN original documentary presents the life, missionary journeys and legacy of the apostle St. Paul, who was driven by a zealous love of Christ to proclaim the Gospel worldwide. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews H.E Yousaf Sohan, Bishop of the Multan diocese in Pakistan to learn about the 2023 blasphemy accusations and violent mob attacks in Jaranwala, Pakistan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Choices We Face
channel.desc: Sr. Mary Gabriel shares her faith journey of falling in love with Jesus and a vocation with the Sisters of Life where she works to protect and enhance the sacredness of human life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Classics: Mother Angelica Presents
channel.desc: Mother Angelica has a saying when people are afraid to listen to God. She calls it the "Old Testament trust." In other words, something that people are reluctant to give up or some form of discomfort. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: To attain heaven, we must become holy as Christ is holy, for it is only in this state that we can stand before God. Susan Conroy explains there are many ways to attain holiness. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Right With Dr. Ray
channel.desc: When mom and dad disagree on how to discipline the kids, accepting it is not the answer. Dr. Ray does some role play on common, everyday situations to impart solid advice for life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: As they continue their debate, Author of Humanae Vitae Blessed Pope Paul VI discovers what fuels Margaret Sanger?s hatred of Church teachings and why she truly founded Planned Parenthood. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Fr. Leo is joined by Jim and Joy Pinto. Together they prepare a wonderful dinner for two as they provide advice on how to keep the romance alive even after many years of marriage. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Dominican Sisters Of Mary, Mother Of The Eucharist
channel.desc: Fr. Nick Monco describes the ways in which to defeat despair and how shame can also either draw us closer to conversion or prevent us from obtaining it. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of Saint Joseph
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this inspirational litany asking for the prayers of Saint Joseph from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: Brian Weber lost his only son in a car crash before getting deployed to Afghanistan. He shares how an encounter with Our Lady of Lourdes in the Grotto changed his life and brought light into the darkness of suffering. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life Is Worth Living
channel.desc: Archbishop Sheen explains how to make humanity more loveable and points to three stages of love. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholicism On Campus: The Students
channel.desc: Msgr. Stuart Swetland and guests talk with the students of Mount Saint Mary's about the Eucharistic power of the Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers caller questions about biblical history as literal or figurative, the presence of apostles at the Last Supper, and a marriage convalidation works in the Church. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Solemnity Of The Feast Of Sts. Peter And Paul
channel.desc: From St. Peter?s Basilica (Altar of the Chair), and presided over by the Holy Father on the Solemnity of Saints Peter and Paul. Holy Mass and blessing of the Pallia for the new Metropolitan Archbishops. (105 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Center At Nyu: An Icon Of The New Evangelization
channel.desc: A documentary on the Dominican-run center at New York University, which provides the spiritual and intellectual formation of 18,000 Catholic students. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Six Paths To The Priesthood
channel.desc: Learn about the different ways Jesus Christ drew each man to the priesthood in this deeply personal account of six Dominican friars ordained by Bishop Robert Barron, who reflects upon his own experiences as well. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Angelus With Pope Leo Xiv
channel.desc: On the Solemnity of the Most Holy Trinity, Pope Leo XIV recites the Angelus in St Peter?s Square, invoking the Blessed Mother and uniting in prayer with many throughout the world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Bookmark
channel.desc: Financial specialist David Bahnsen explains how we discover meaning and purpose in work, and why a successful life is rooted in productivity and cultivation of God?s created world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Spirit Of Catholic Leadership
channel.desc: How to integrate Christian love into your leadership lives; putting principle and the common good before personal interests. (30 minutes).
